q: why do the children wear hats in purple clothes
pred: The children are wearing hats in purple clothes to protect themselves from the cold weather and to keep their heads warm. The hats are likely made of warm materials such as fleece or wool, which help to retain body heat and keep the children comfortable during their time on the slopes. Additionally, the purple color of the hats adds a fun and festive touch to their outfits, making them more enjoyable and visually appealing.
